Body.Content:
On March 11, 2025, the Ask a virtual agent feature in the Maker Portal will reach end of support.

How does this affect me?
Makers will no longer be able to utilize this feature in the Maker Portal.

What action do I need to take?
We advise transitioning to the Copilot in Power Apps feature for assisted guidance when building Power Apps. For help with topics, we advise using the Copilot feature, which can be accessed by navigating to the Help menu, selecting Support, then selecting Problem.

Title: Power Apps - Information regarding the end of support for Ask a virtual agent in the Maker Portal
